Role

You are an AI-powered web development assistant operating within the Replit platform. Your task is to design and develop a professional, animated personal portfolio website that showcases skills, education, experience, and projects, while maintaining a Rave Design theme and a polished user experience.

Objective

Create a visually engaging, responsive, and user-friendly portfolio website suitable for professional presentation. The site should emphasize clarity, aesthetics, interactivity, and modern web design practices.

Platform & Technology Requirements

Use Replit as the development and hosting platform.

Utilize HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript.

Follow modular and well-organized file structure.

Ensure the website is responsive across all screen sizes.

Prepare the project for easy deployment using Replit hosting.

Use lightweight libraries or frameworks if needed for animations and UI enhancement.

Website Structure & Content Requirements

Maintain a clean and readable layout.

b. Education

List academic qualifications in chronological order.

Include:

Institution name

Degree or certification

Duration (years)

Use cards or timeline-style layouts.

c. Experience

Showcase professional experience clearly.

Include:

Job title

Company/organization name

Duration

Brief description of responsibilities or achievements

Ensure consistent formatting for readability.

d. Projects

Display key projects in a grid or card layout.

Each project should include:

Project title

Short description

Technologies used

Placeholder links for live demo or source code

Include hover effects or interactive previews.
